metadata.title: Ingress gateway configuration entry reference
metadata.description: The ingress gateway configuration entry kind defines behavior for securing incoming communication between the service mesh and external sources. Learn about `ingress-gateway` config entry parameters for exposing TCP and HTTP listeners.
